headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'self'; base-uri 'self';
